items.question: What is the first thing you should do in case of a fire emergency?
options: Try to put out the fire yourself
Call emergency services and evacuate
Hide in a closet
Start gathering your valuables

items.question: During an earthquake, what is the safest action to take indoors?
options: Run outside immediately
Stand under a doorway
Drop, cover, and hold on under a sturdy piece of furniture
Stay near windows to assess the situation

items.question: What should you do if you encounter a suspicious package in a public place?
options: Open it to inspect the contents
Move it to a less crowded area
Report it to authorities and keep a safe distance
Ignore it and walk away

items.question: In the event of a chemical spill, what is the best immediate action?
options: Try to clean it up yourself
Evacuate the area and alert emergency services
Stay close to observe the situation
Use water to dilute the chemical

items.question: What is the correct way to use a fire extinguisher?
options: Aim at the top of the flames and spray
Use the PASS method: Pull, Aim, Squeeze, Sweep
Spray in a circular motion
Hold the extinguisher upside down

items.question: During a severe storm with lightning, what is the safest place to be?
options: Under a tree
In an open field
Inside a sturdy building or a car
Near metal objects

items.question: What should you do if you are trapped in a building during a fire?
options: Jump out of the window
Stay low to the ground and cover your nose and mouth
Open all the windows to let the smoke out
Run through the smoke to find an exit

items.question: What is the best way to prepare for a potential emergency at home?
options: Ignore the possibility of emergencies
Have an emergency kit and a family emergency plan
Rely solely on emergency services
Keep all important documents in one place without copies

items.question: If someone is experiencing a severe allergic reaction, what should you do first?
options: Give them water to drink
Administer an epinephrine auto-injector if available
Wait to see if it gets worse
Have them lie down and rest

items.question: What is the most important thing to do during a power outage?
options: Light candles in every room
Use a generator indoors for power
Check on neighbors and use flashlights for safety
Open the refrigerator to check on food
